alerts.markdown: A processing error in New Orders has led to revisions for regional water data not feeding through to top level Great Britain Infrastructure totals. To enable us to carry out further quality assurance on the data, table 6 on the new orders reference tables has been reissued with the revisions removed. These changes have no impact on construction output, GDP or top level new orders data. We apologise for any inconvenience.

description.title: New orders in the construction Industry
description.summary: Quarterly new orders at current price and chained volume measures seasonally adjusted by public and private sector. Quarterly non–seasonally adjusted type of work and regional data.
